design_philosophy.emotional_goal: A feeling of 'Newness' and 'Precision'. Every pixel must feel like unboxing a fresh Apple product.

typography.installation: Import 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' from Google Fonts in index.css

primary.description: Electric Red - Use for Buy Buttons, Alerts, and Urgent CTAs.

modes.hero: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8 h-auto md:h-[90vh]
modes.bento_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 auto-rows-[300px]

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF3B30] hover:bg-[#D72F26] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold text-sm tracking-wide transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-black text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold hover:bg-gray-800
buttons.outline: border-2 border-gray-200 hover:border-black bg-transparent text-black rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold transition-colors

cards.solid: bg-gray-50 border border-transparent hover:border-gray-200 transition-all duration-300

rules: Product images must have generous whitespace.
People must look authentic/candid, not corporate stock.
Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 5%) to images to kill digital gloss.
Ensure Red (#FF3B30) is only used on White/Light backgrounds for text, or use White text on Red background.
Interactive elements must have min-width 44px for mobile.
All images must have alt text describing the gadget or emotion.

home.hero_strategy: Split screen or Heavy Asymmetry. Left: Massive 'WE FIX IT' or 'UPGRADE NOW' type. Right: Floating 3D-style product shot (use Parallax).

shop.grid_style: Clean, minimal cards. Image dominant. Price and Title below in bold.

repair.form_style: Multi-step wizard feel. Big clickable icons for 'Screen', 'Battery', 'Water Damage'.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. It is CRITICAL for the tech look.
Do not use generic gray backgrounds. Use subtle off-whites (#FAFAFA) to distinguish sections.
The 'Red' accent is your power color. Use it sparingly but boldly (Buttons, Price tags, Sale badges).
Mobile navigation must be a bottom bar or a full-screen overlay menu.
Create a 'data-testid' for every interactive element.
Theme: FORCE LIGHT MODE. Dark mode only for footer or specific high-contrast sections.
For the 'UK Used Phones' section, use a 'Verified' badge metaphor to build trust.
